title: PS403 Statistics and Probability
text:
PS 403 • Fall 2025  Department of Political Science

Northwestern University


This site is designed to support students enrolled in the PS403 Statistics and Probability course. Here, you will find lab materials. In the section, we will focus on coding and practicing the concepts covered in the lectures.
